mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_NUM, R.LECT_NUM, L.LECT_NAME, R.TITLE, R.CONTENT, M.NAME WRITER, M.ID WRITER_ID,R.WRITE_DATE, R.HIT FROM REVIEW R, MEMBER M, LECTURE L WHERE R.WRITER = M.ID AND R.LECT_NUM = L.LECT_NUM AND R.REVIEW_NUM = #{review_num}
SELECT R.REVIEW_NUM, R.LECT_NUM, R.TITLE, R.CONTENT, M.NAME WRITER, M.ID WRITER_ID,R.WRITE_DATE, R.HIT FROM REVIEW R, MEMBER M WHERE R.WRITER = M.ID

SELECT R.REVIEW_NUM, R.LECT_NUM, L.LECT_NAME, R.TITLE, R.CONTENT, M.NAME WRITER, R. WRITE_DATE, M.IMG FROM REVIEW R, MEMBER M, LECTURE L WHERE R.WRITER = M.ID AND R.LECT_NUM = L.LECT_NUM AND HIT = (SELECT MAX(HIT) FROM REVIEW)
SELECT REVIEW_NUM, LECT_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, WRITE_DATE, HIT FROM REVIEW WHERE #{searchKind} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_NUM, LECT_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, WRITE_DATE) VALUES(REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{lect_num}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, WRITE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REVIEW_NUM = #{review_num}
UPDATE REVIEW SET Hit = Hit+1 WHERE REVIEW_NUM = #{review_num}
